title: Cucumber and Mango Salad with Zambos Tostones
ingredients: ¼ of red onion finely chopped
instructions: Step 1: Peel and chop the mango and cucumber. Size to taste. Chop the cilantro and onion and mix in a bowl.
Step 2: In another bowl, pour vinegar, lime juice, olive oil, honey and tajin. Mix the dressing. Consistency is to taste.
Step 3: Pour the dressing on the salad.
Step 4: Place the Zambos Tostones on top of the salad and enjoy the Homestyle Cucumber and Mango Salad.
